column3: The effect of the assumed conversion of certain convertible units had an anti-dilutive effect upon the calculation of Income from continuing operations per share. Accordingly, the impact of such conversions has not been included in the determination of diluted earnings per share calculations. Additionally, there were 3,490,400, 5,300,680 and 7,137,120, stock options that were not dilutive as of December 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively.
